subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Steroids
Suits and Litigation
Testosterone
lead_paragraph: With each passing day of his arbitration fight, the credibility of a French lab has been rendered a footnote by each salacious revelation impugning Floyd Landis’s character.
